articles.title: About this blog
articles.description: This blog is a portfolio about my studies in R, mainly on data science.
articles.contents:
Hi!
 
 
Hello, my name is Gabriel de Freitas Pereira, and I am a Forest Engineering student at UFSCar (Federal University of São Carlos). I began my studies in 2018 and have since been focusing on conservation efforts. In 2019, I initiated a project aimed at identifying priority areas for the conservation of Brazil nut trees. This involved genetic and climatic analyses, and in early 2020, the project was approved. I also took the opportunity to learn R language, which has been incredibly exciting as it has allowed me to explore the field of data science.
 
With this blog, my primary goal is to keep myself engaged in the topic and share my insights on data science in the context of my studies.
